forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: undo button

comments.text: please make an undo button!! every time i hide something that i didn't make a backup state for, i need to somehow find it.
there is a back button but you can only undo that part once, you context laser the part and in the bottom right there is an undo button. but you can only undo movements
i made a mod that adds proper multi undo/redo like most software has. [thread: 612b2b604d1d471e6647027c]

thread.latestCommentText: i made a mod that adds proper multi undo/redo. google "anyland mods" and you should find my steam guide.
